name: VR Store Simulator-Superstore
summary: VR Store Simulator: Your Ultimate VR Retail Experience! Manage your own supermarket with VR Store Simulator, the exciting VR game for Meta Quest. Make decisions that grow your store from a small shop to the town's favorite market. Stock shelves, manage staff, and watch your business thrive! Key Features: Stock and Organize: Keep shelves full and products organized for a smooth shopping experience. Smart Pricing: Adjust prices to attract more customers and boost profits.
